Pages.title: about me
Pages.intro: Find out about my my skills my expereinces and passions
summary: I am an adaptable and driven individual with a versatile skillset that uniquely binds design and engineering principles.
I have a passion for developing hardware and software of products using my innovative thinking and unique skillset to creatively solve problems.

Pages.title: contact me
summary: I am currently open to doing freelance front-end development and open to being contacted regarding short projects.
In the long term I am looking to continue developing my skills as a Design Engineer and hope to involve myslef in the development of new products

Pages.title: my projects
Pages.intro: See some of the work I have produced in the past
summary: As a design engineer it was important to develop interdisciplinary skils aswell as soft skills to enable teams to succeed together.
Throughout my time at Imperial, I had the opportunity to work with a number of extraordinary engineers and different exciting projects where I could build and demonstrate my unique skills

Outcome.title: Outcome
text: The dog and ball launcher is designed to enhance the relationship between person and there pet by making it easier them to exercise the Dog through the use of a ball. The automatic ball launcher is designed to remove the need to strain ones back or shoulder when throwing a ball during fetch.

Process.title: Analysis
text: Following choosing an idea and mechanism, the team then began research into mechanics the of launching the ball using Matlab to conduct engineering analysis. We also began analysing the donor components to evaluate the viability of the components in our mechanism

Process.title: Prototyping
text: Following this research we begin building our final functional prototype using CAD and create a set of engineering drawings to go with it. The prototype used an arduino to control the electronics.

Projects.title: Dog & Ball: The Automated Ball Thrower

Outcome.title: Outcome
text: The dog and ball launcher is designed to enhance the relationship between person and there pet by making it easier them to exercise the Dog through the use of a ball. The automatic ball launcher is designed to remove the need to strain ones back or shoulder when throwing a ball during fetch.
